all_text_timv: Policarpo : ufficiale di scrittura / una produzione Titanus ; realizzata da Silvio Clementelli ; regia di Mario Soldati. [Rome] : Titanus, [1959?] [Rome] : 01 Distribution, [2010?] ℗2010 1 videodisc (103 min.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in. two-dimensional moving image tdi rdacontent video v rdamedia videodisc vd rdacarrier PAL rda video file DVD video region 2 rda Originally released as a motion picture in 1959. Cinematography, Giuseppe Rotunno ; editing, Mario Serandrei ; music, Angelo Francesco Lavagnino. Renato Rascel, Tony Soler, José Isbert, Carla Gravina, Romolo Valli, Luigi De Filippo, Trini Montero, Roberto Rey, Lidia Martora Maresca, Ernesto Calindri, Massimo Pianforini, Renato Salvatori, Peppino De Filippo. Italian comedy. Policarp encourages his daughter to date the son of his supervisor in the hopes of moving up the social ladder. However, his supervisor thinks she's below his son, and tries to undermine the romance. Meanwhile, Policarp's daughter is actually in love with a local mechanic. Who will be together in the end? DVD, region 2, PAL; Dolby 2.0. No public performance rights. Classroom instruction and home use permitted. Motion pictures, Italian. Foreign films.
